attributes.action: totally abolish any more legislation for 'gay rights' (such as the proposed Sexual Orientation Regulation)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Joint Committee on Human Rights (JCHR) believe that Gay people should be given undeniable rights to do whatever they please, even if this limits, or indeed removes the freedom of other groups to act in the way they want to, and have done for years.

They propose to 'limit the manifestation of those beliefs' that contrast with those of gays. (Actual quote from JCHR report)

We do not want homosexuality to be banned, all we want is that our freedom, whether religious or atheistic be retained.

If you hold any type of belief, whther religious or not against gays, your civil freedom to say and think what you like will be taken away unless the SOR is stopped.
